Reviews.Content: not what we were expecting arrive at night .the room was a let down dirtyand a sad bathroom. the pillows were moldly and walls black dirty marks.next day went for brekfast there was flies every where which put me off eating.the tables where cleaned with a dust pan and bush so need a good wash.our room never seems to be cleaned just the bed made and the floor cleaned with dirty mop.we come from england a long way and the whole hoilday was not what i was expecting
Reviews.Author: chefengland

Reviews.Author: WagasWagu

Reviews.Content: Bad hotel I stayed at this hotel in May 2008, I have been, my eighth time is at Bali, for me it has been disappointment, at the room there were mosquitoes for all the sides, and they enter because doors and windows many old women are and contorted, you turn off the light, and you see the light outside for the borders. We sent clothing to the dry cleaner's, and they deliver nothing else to the fourth day, than a cap, they say than the other one they will give it tomorrow, if I get to know it before. And your staff and reception, of the lowest in atendimiento and attention, in our bedsheet, there were a previous woman customer's signs of menstruation, and instead of changing the bedsheet and point, they dedicate themselves to make the partridge dizzy, until you have to get angry a little, and there it is when they try to solve things, when I do not have to get angry in my vacations, and only I am asking for a certain amount of cleanliness, because I have given a money to change, not content, we left the rest of our vacations 26 days, to a close hotel, half-price, And there it was when really we started to sense that we were on vacation.
Reviews.Author: franquipani

Reviews.Content: A superb experience I have just returned from a three week stay at the Adhi Dharma hotel and enjoyed every minute of our stay there.The hotel is situated in a quiet area of Kuta, a block away from the noise and bustle of Lejian St. and yet it's possible to walk there in three or four minutes, cutting through the A.D Cottages hotel.The outstanding feature of the hotel is its staff. Every member of staff from the outstanding Directrice to the Trainee waitress who took a delight in serving us daily, and was almost in tears when we left, knew his/her job perfectly and took a professional pride in making our stay as pleasant as possible. The stay was more than pleasant - it was superb and we left with the full intention of returning there next year and renewing, despite a terribly long air trip to reach Bali.We were on half board. The hotel provides an excellent breakfast and we alternated between lunch and dinner in the hotel and discovering local eateries in the vicinity for the other meal. Opposite the hotel's entrance there is an excellent car hire shop and their driver, who speaks some English is very good. I can thoroughly recommend him. An excellent trip is to Lovina Beach on the North coast, but if you go there do not eat at the Rice Terraces restaurant, where we had the only poor meal in Bali.There are lots of good eating places in the close vicinity of the hotel - I hesitate to endorse any because One man's meat..... but I don't think you'd be too disappointed with any.I would go back there any time.
Reviews.Author: berwicker

Reviews.Content: Great family hotel       lower floors outside
Reviews.Author: denpete52

Reviews.Content: Could have been a lot better The location of the hotel was great, it was right in the midst of all the shopping and restaurants. The hotel rooms were clean but shabby, Management could think about renovating. The food was pretty good. The pool was very small and very average although it had a very nice swim up bar. The staff weren't all that friendly and when we finally checked out, our pool towel tickets had mysteriously(and i use the term loosely) disappeared from our table in our room and they tried to charge us a phenominal amount of money to pay them for the terrible pool towels that we didn't have! then they demanded an apology letter for us losing the pool towel tickets?? They must be kidding. I would NEVER stay there again nor would i recommend this hotel to anyone.
Reviews.Author: Aussie_Katt

Reviews.Content: Good location. Helpful staff. But basic Stayed recently at the Adhi Dharma hotel (although the Adhi dharma cottage seemed more tempting). The rooms are very basic and a bit old in appearance. Its time to upgrade. The bed linens were also not very clean.Also the AC kept on dripping continiuously.The staff is very friendly and the service is with a smile. Location wise, no room for complain. Its close to kuta and legian beaches yet a step away from the noisy kuta. The swimming pool is alsonice, though on the smaller side. I dont know if i will return to the hotel again, but if you are on a budget travel, u can give it a try.
Reviews.Author: ANIRMITR2

Reviews.Content: great with kids I stayed at the Adhi Dharma Hotel with my two children and they had a ball. We had interconnecting rooms and they were very spacious and clean,especially for all the stuff we bought in Bali.The breakfast was great everymorning. My only complaint would be that the food from room service wasn't very nice.The huge spring rolls were yummy though. My kids had never been to Bali and we are going back in August and they want to stay there again.The service was great the people lovely.
Reviews.Author: indy6Perth

Reviews.Content: Excellent accomodation       View from our room balcony
